to carry out internship in it department under different sections.responsibilities:it helpdesk, support & projects:- follow up on data consolidation and helpdesk calls.- automation of it operations.- development/enhancement on project & support dashboards.cdm & application support: - assist users, troubleshoot issues, and offer solutions.- collect, analyze, and report data for informed decision-making in collaboration.software development:- low code and no code development.- web and mobile application development. requirements:- candidates must be currently pursuing a bachelor's degree in computer science/ information technology/ software engineering or equivalent from recognized universities with minimum current cgpa 3.0.- proficiency in both written and spoken english and bahasa malaysia.- preferably at least 4 months of internship period.- willing to be based in ipoh. please indicate your internship period in your resume.
